# VN Templates QR Downloader - robots.txt
# Last Updated: October 2025
# Website: https://vntemplatesqrdownloader.online

# ========================================
# ALLOW MAJOR SEARCH ENGINES
# ========================================

User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0.5

User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0.5

User-agent: Googlebot-Video
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Baiduspider
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 2

User-agent: YandexBot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 2

User-agent: facebookexternalhit

User-agent: Discordbot
Allow: /

# BLOCK AI SCRAPERS & BAD BOTS

User-agent: GPTBot

# ========================================
# DEFAULT RULES FOR ALL BOTS
# ========================================

User-agent: *
# Allow public pages
Allow: /
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /logo.png
Allow: /og-image.png
Allow: /manifest.json

# Block private/system files
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/private/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /*.config.js$
Disallow: /*.config.ts$
Disallow: /*?apikey=
Disallow: /*?api_key=
Disallow: /*?token=
Disallow: /*?password=
Disallow: /*?session=

# ========================================
# SITEMAPS
# ========================================

Sitemap: https://vntemplatesqrdownloader.online/sitemap.xml

# ========================================
# CRAWL DELAY

Crawl-delay: 1
